examples: He appeared relaxed and confident before the match.
Parecía relajado y confiado antes del partido.
She had a very relaxed manner.
She looked completely relaxed, as if she didn't have a worry in the world.
Parecía completamente relajada, como si no tuviera ninguna preocupación en el mundo.
I’m feeling more relaxed about the future now.
Ahora me siento más relajado sobre el futuro.
